name: Fools Gold (ndaygamedev)
description:
GameDev.TV 2021 Game Jam Submission (Solo Dev)

This 2D top-down shooter is a pirate adventure where your goal is to gather as much gold from mysterious islands, without being “weighed” down by the consequences. Battle enemy ghost ships as you fight and dodge your way to becoming the richest ship in the seas.

Update 1.1: 

Added macOS and Linux support

Added several UI additions (player speed and game hint)

Fixed Enemy not aiming at player
